scripts.build: yarn workspace @anticrm/foundation build && yarn workspace @anticrm/platform build && yarn workspace @anticrm/model build && yarn workspace @anticrm/core build
scripts.build:docs: yarn workspace @anticrm/foundation build:docs && yarn workspace @anticrm/platform build:docs && yarn workspace @anticrm/model build:docs && yarn workspace @anticrm/core build:docs
scripts.gen-docs: cd docs && npm install && npm run build
